sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import StockSVG from '../../assets/stock.svg' import "../styles/StatsRow.css" function StatsRow({name, openPrice, price, shares}) { const percentChange = ( (price - openPrice)/openPrice)*100; return (

{key}

{shares && (shares + "shares")}

{price}

{Number(percentChange).toFixed(2)}

) } export default StatsRow
